meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>orphan</kanji> who's <kanji>alone</kanji> is trapped in a world of <vocabulary>isolation</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>loneliness</vocabulary>. Having no parents is hard enough, but not having anyone else is even lonelier.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
